column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Zhao says : " ... And by the year 's end , the Earth Kingdom capital will be under our rule .
#Text=" Zhao says : " Two years at sea have done little to temper your tongue .
#Text=So , how is your search for the Avatar going ?
#Text=" Iroh says : " Eh .
#Text=.
#Text=My fault , entirely .
#Text=" Zuko says : " We have n't found him yet .
#Text=" Zhao says : " Did you really expect to ?
#Text=The Avatar died a hundred years ago .
#Text=Along with the rest of the airbenders .
#Text=Unless you have found some evidence that the Avatar is alive ?
#Text=" Zuko says : " No .
#Text=Nothing .
#Text=" Zhao says : " Prince Zuko , the Avatar is the only one who can stop the Fire Nation from winning this war .
#Text=If you have an ounce of loyalty left , you 'll tell me what you found .
#Text=" Zuko says : " I have n't found anything .
#Text=It 's like you said .
#Text=The Avatar probably died a long time ago .
#Text=Come on , Uncle , we 're going .
#Text=" Soldier says : " Commander Zhao , we interrogated the crew as you instructed .
#Text=They confirmed Prince Zuko had the Avatar in custody , but let him escape .
#Text=" Zhao says : " Now remind me , how , exactly , was your ship damaged ?
#Text="
